title: Top Floor 1 bedroom with STUNNING DT Bellevue View!
posting_body: ['Reach New Heights At Vue 22 ApartmentsDesigned to be a new lens for which to see the world, Vue 22 Apartments provides the perfect setting to start elevating your expectations.', 'From our rooftop deck with outdoor TVs and an unobstructed view of the surrounding neighborhood to our high-tech fitness center and yoga studio, you’ll love calling our Bellevue community home.', 'Balancing work and play will come effortlessly on our lushly landscaped grounds, as you enjoy time in the organic community garden or socializing with friends over a game of bocce in the courtyard.', 'Let Vue 22 Apartments in Bellevue wrap you in all the comforts and luxe details you deserve with everything from wood-style flooring, quartz countertops, and stainless steel appliances to front-loading washers and dryers and built-in desks.', '(+more)', 'Our Crossroads apartments are ideally situated near the heart of Bellevue.', 'We are within minutes of the Microsoft campus, and the Bellevue Technology Center, plus our proximity to WA-520 provides ease of access to other major employers and endless shopping, dining, and entertainment destinations in nearby Seattle, Redmond, and Kirkland.', 'Discover our spacious and sophisticated studio, one and two bedroom apartments and lofts in Bellevue, Washington with all of the convenience, character, and premium features you could ask for.', 'To learn more about Vue 22 Apartments, contact our leasing office today to schedule a tour.', '-Easy access to WA-520, I-90, I-405, and I-5', '-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:', 'Only a small one-time payment', '-Separate dining area', '-Controlled-entry access parking garage', '-Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen and billiards table, shuffleboard table and arcade games', '-Dog wash and self-service grooming area', '-Smart thermostat', '-Mosaic tile kitchen backsplash', '-Concierge services', '-Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi', '-Kitchen island with pendant lighting', '-Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
